display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-rem RDI at 3% desat
description: Non-REM RDI at 3% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 + manrbp3 + manrop3) / (slpprdp - minremp)
